function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 infection through medical IoT devices","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict data security protocols and regular device sanitization","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure communication protocols, IoT health monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Latency in real-time diagnosis and data processing","Impact":"Delayed diagnosis and treatment of patients","Mitigation":"Optimize fog computing infrastructure, improve data processing algorithms","Technologies":"Fog computing, AI for real-time data analysis, medical IoT devices","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Security risk of cloud computing in healthcare data storage","Impact":"Exposure of sensitive health data to cyber-attacks","Mitigation":"Implement robust encryption, access control, and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Cloud security protocols, encryption algorithms, access control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, IT professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, cloud service providers"}]}
